name: autociv
label: Autociv mod 0 A.D. enhancer. Author: nani(99%),seeh(1%)
description: Works best in 0ad v0.0.27 (in 26 function ConfigDB_CreateAndSaveValue is not available. Features: chat civ picker, building placement hotkeys, building selection hotkeys, local mute, chat link opener, etc. Compatible with vanilla.
